channel.title: Posts on joshbergman.io
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on joshbergman.io

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, My name is Josh Bergman. I am a Platform Engineer with 7+ years of experience in AWS and Automation. I have worked in AWS cloud for more than 10 years using Ansible, StackStorm, Terraform, Salt, CloudFormation and Jenkins to create Infrastructure as code in bitbucket. For a list of my full skillset, please visit my skills page.
item.content: Hello, My name is Josh Bergman. I am a Platform Engineer with 7+ years of experience in AWS and Automation. I have worked in AWS cloud for more than 10 years using Ansible, StackStorm, Terraform, Salt, CloudFormation and Jenkins to create Infrastructure as code in bitbucket. For a list of my full skillset, please visit my skills page.
